props.name: autoCreate
props.desc:
A DomHelper element spec, or true for a default element spec (defaults to
{tag: "input", type: "checkbox", autocomplete: "off"})

props.name: boxLabel
props.desc: The text that appears beside the checkbox

props.name: checked
props.desc: True if the the checkbox should render already checked (defaults to false)

props.name: fieldClass
props.desc: The default CSS class for the checkbox (defaults to "x-form-field")

props.name: focusClass
props.desc: The CSS class to use when the checkbox receives focus (defaults to undefined)

props.name: inputValue
props.desc: The value that should go into the generated input element's value attribute

props.name: valueOff
props.desc: The value that should go into the generated input element's value when unchecked.

events.name: check
events.desc: Fires when the checkbox is checked or unchecked.
